com.tobedevoured.modelcitizen

Class ModelFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tobedevoured.modelcitizen.ModelFactory

  • public class ModelFactory
extends Object
    ModelFactory for generating Models. A Model's Blueprint is registered with the ModelFactory. Then a Model can be generated with createModel(Class) or createModel(Object)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelFactory()
      Create new instance

      • createModel

        public <T> T createModel(T referenceModel)
              throws CreateModelException
        Create a Model for a registered Blueprint. Values set in the model will not be overridden by defaults in the Blueprint.
        Parameters:
        referenceModel - Object
        Returns:
        Model
        Throws:
        CreateModelException

      • createModel

      • createModel

        public <T> T createModel(Erector erector,
                T referenceModel,
                boolean withPolicies)
              throws CreateModelException
        Create a Model for a registered Blueprint using Erector. Values set in the model will not be overridden by defaults in the Blueprint.
        Parameters:
        erector - Erector
        referenceModel - T
        withPolicies - boolean if Policies should be applied to the create
